a417206a-fc68-4f92-9c05-8e5ab8bd273f.name: Combat Reflexes
a417206a-fc68-4f92-9c05-8e5ab8bd273f.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

d2293d9f-d63a-47de-8ced-54823064fa7c.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

cc7c94e3-658e-4002-a939-f31c5f51e160.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

cc2e0e94-3106-4dbe-acb2-d74a9b4a9b7b.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

6fc2d84a-bcdb-48ed-a6a2-ba840270e79f.name: Wise Master
6fc2d84a-bcdb-48ed-a6a2-ba840270e79f.notes: Choose 20 points. You can add your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

660af3fc-8985-483a-91a9-93b431db6f25.name: Luck, Extraordinary
660af3fc-8985-483a-91a9-93b431db6f25.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

819aa960-4b90-453c-ad6e-36b40999ec42.name: Easy to Hit
819aa960-4b90-453c-ad6e-36b40999ec42.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

e41d31eb-dbf3-4748-ba8e-919379863574.name: Signature Gear
e41d31eb-dbf3-4748-ba8e-919379863574.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

9445a809-aa83-4b9a-a59b-3fe35ba1a7e2.name: Luck
9445a809-aa83-4b9a-a59b-3fe35ba1a7e2.notes: Usable once per hour of play

782e8879-bbd5-4666-8923-4ecdcc1f005c.name: Weapon Master (Ninja Weapons)
782e8879-bbd5-4666-8923-4ecdcc1f005c.notes: Anything with an Asian name or Holdout 0 to -2.

1d310569-d6da-44b5-88a1-248085134dad.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

9e091328-ade5-418e-8512-1fa429858240.name: Insomniac (Mild)
9e091328-ade5-418e-8512-1fa429858240.notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

37ff11e5-4b30-4497-9ff7-41650d7a2558.name: Insomniac (Severe)
37ff11e5-4b30-4497-9ff7-41650d7a2558.notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes

066d258b-2c0e-4b85-93a3-28036f6b412d.name: Martial Arts Perks
066d258b-2c0e-4b85-93a3-28036f6b412d.notes: Distribute 10 points between these and Martial Arts Skills.

2b72c8de-441d-430c-bdb2-048af1290667.name: Deadly Pose
2b72c8de-441d-430c-bdb2-048af1290667.notes: Free Intimidation attempt upon takedown. -5 in combat. +2 for knockout. +5 for fatality.

7db21086-9eac-4ae3-9589-391f9f5269bc.name: Finishing Move (@Attack@)
7db21086-9eac-4ae3-9589-391f9f5269bc.notes: +1 per die of damage, but only upon disabled foes.

89ef815b-108d-4fa5-a74f-e9e1cb690bd7.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
89ef815b-108d-4fa5-a74f-e9e1cb690bd7.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

9f5f7712-52ca-4ac3-9c90-141cc57657e8.name: Trademark Move
9f5f7712-52ca-4ac3-9c90-141cc57657e8.notes: +1 to @One turn of detailed combat actions@

20f2a8b7-a5c9-465c-a062-a4a12652a485.name: Choose 18 points
20f2a8b7-a5c9-465c-a062-a4a12652a485.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

a44af9e4-980d-4000-9f7c-cfeb54043e6d.name: Intelligence
a44af9e4-980d-4000-9f7c-cfeb54043e6d.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

10940d2e-4f80-4d7a-b3e7-d9f5fe806471.name: Choose 16 points
10940d2e-4f80-4d7a-b3e7-d9f5fe806471.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

033d18be-28f4-4686-bf92-1b1f0466c76e.name: Choose 18 points
033d18be-28f4-4686-bf92-1b1f0466c76e.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

efc2e4d3-cca1-4dc8-b283-d61142ea847f.name: Security
efc2e4d3-cca1-4dc8-b283-d61142ea847f.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

1e5ef947-d89d-460f-bcfb-524132fb3ca4.name: Wise Master
1e5ef947-d89d-460f-bcfb-524132fb3ca4.notes: 20 points in your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

773ae92c-4edf-45c2-9696-c9ae01c7b574.name: Martial Arts Skills
773ae92c-4edf-45c2-9696-c9ae01c7b574.notes: Distribute 10 points between these and Martial Arts Perks.

7dcc73c7-c61e-48fc-b985-8d2b0ceda406.name: Choose six
7dcc73c7-c61e-48fc-b985-8d2b0ceda406.notes: Or five, and raise one (or Stealth) by a level.

21d111ca-d6ae-492e-9c60-6bff936b3592.name: Judo
21d111ca-d6ae-492e-9c60-6bff936b3592.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

2e41244b-88b6-44fd-a1c3-757ad4e59968.name: Choose six
2e41244b-88b6-44fd-a1c3-757ad4e59968.notes: Or five, and raise one (or Holdout, Jumping, or Shadowing) by a level.
